sentences.sContent: When Hamilton was 11 years old, his mother died. Hamilton got a job as an assistant bookkeeper. He learned how to keep financial records.
sentences.sContent_eng: When Hamilton was 11 years old, his mother died. Hamilton got a job as an assistant bookkeeper. He learned how to keep financial records.
sentences.sCn: 他的母亲在他11岁时去世了。汉密尔顿得到了一份给会计当助手的工作。他学会了如何记账。

synos.tran: [会计]簿记员；会计员；铁路的司旗员

remMethod.val: book(账簿) + keeper(管理人) → 记账人
